Title: Region has at least one CloudTrail trail logging
Description: No CloudTrail trails enabled with logging were found.

RelatedRequirements: NIST-800-53-Revision-4 ac_2_4 ac_2 au_2 au_3 au_12 cm_2
NIST-800-53-Revision-5 ac_2_4 ac_3_1 ac_3_10 ac_4_26 ac_6_9 au_
NIST-CSF-1.1 ae_1 ae_3 ae_4 cm_1 cm_3 cm_6 cm_7 am_3 ac_6 ds_5
FedRamp-Moderate-Revision-4 ac-2-4 ac-2-g au-2-a-d au-3 au-6-1-

Recommendation.Text:
Use a **multi-region CloudTrail trail** or per-region trails so `logging` is active in every region, including unused ones.

Centralize logs, enforce **least privilege** to log stores, and add **defense-in-depth** with encryption, integrity validation, and retention. Continuously monitor trail health to catch gaps.

Title: CloudTrail trail records S3 object-level read events for all S3 buckets
Description: No CloudTrail trails have a data event to record all S3 object-level API operations.

RelatedRequirements: NIST-800-53-Revision-5 ac_2_4 ac_3_1 ac_3_10 ac_4_26 ac_6_9 au_
NIST-CSF-1.1 ae_3 ae_4 cm_1 cm_3 cm_6 cm_7 ds_5
FedRamp-Moderate-Revision-4 ac-2-4 ac-2-g au-2-a-d au-3 au-6-1-

Recommendation.Text: Enable CloudTrail **data events** for S3 objects with `ReadOnly` (or `All`) across all current and future buckets. Use a multi-Region trail, centralize logs in an encrypted bucket with lifecycle retention, and integrate monitoring/alerts to support **defense in depth** and accountable access.

Types: Software and Configuration Checks/AWS Security Best Practices
Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/AWS Foundational Security Best Practices
Software and Configuration Checks/Industry and Regulatory Standards/CIS AWS Foundations Benchmark
Title: CloudTrail trail records all S3 object-level API operations for all buckets
Description: No CloudTrail trails have a data event to record all S3 object-level API operations.

RelatedRequirements: NIST-800-53-Revision-5 ac_2_4 ac_3_1 ac_3_10 ac_4_26 ac_6_9 au_
NIST-CSF-1.1 ae_3 ae_4 cm_1 cm_3 cm_6 cm_7 ds_5
FedRamp-Moderate-Revision-4 ac-2-4 ac-2-g au-2-a-d au-3 au-6-1-

Recommendation.Text: Enable **CloudTrail S3 data events** for object-level **write** (and *optionally* read) across all buckets on a multi-Region trail. Apply **least privilege** to log storage, set **lifecycle** retention, and integrate alerts. Use **advanced selectors** to target sensitive buckets/operations for cost control and **defense in depth**.
